website_summaries.verdict: A tropically styled kids' cruiser bike designed for riders who are between ages 5 and 9.
pros: Decorative fenders and chain guard help protect both bike and rider from unexpected splashes
Seat and hand grips provide extra comfort
Lightweight aluminum frame is backed by a 10-year limited warranty
cons: Occasionally, a bike may slip through quality control and arrive with a damaged tire

customer_reviews.title: Risky buy! Keep looking!
customer_reviews.text: The bike arrived with a flat rear tire. The inner tube had a hole. I had to bring this bike to a bike store to have the inner tube replaced. They found the spokes were too long and thus poked through the wheel cover and the inner tube. So they also had to replace the wheel cover. They said it would probably happen again. I could have bought a much more expensive bike for the cost of repairing this new bike. Ugh. Bad choice!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Came in defective!
customer_reviews.text: Tire tube on the rear has a leak. Having to take rear tire off, remove tube, buy a replacement tube and reinstall. Just out of the box and before my granddaughter gets to see and ride it. Really poor given the price. Genders are flimsy but hoping they will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: P'cola beach

customer_reviews.title: Hole in tire
customer_reviews.text: The bike looks great and seems like a quality made bike...however, there was a hole in one of the tire tubes. Bought this for my daughter for her birthday so had to run to the store to buy a new tube. Unable to contact the company directly so writing the review to hopefully get reimbursed or get some kind of discount off the bike due to the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel I

customer_reviews.title: I love my bike 🌸❤️
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful, it was not difficult to put together, it rides like a dream, love the flowers! Didn’t realize it had the bottle opener until I got it lol🤘😎fun surprise So excited to take it camping this summer
customer_reviews.author: Hooper.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love, love, love my bike!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition, not difficult to put together, looks fabulous, feels very sturdy and comfortable. Can't wait to take it on it's maiden voyage Christmas day. Bought a bell, new basket and garland of flowers to add extra snazz. Still looking for the right pannier bag and I'll be all set for cruising through city parks.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Missing part and punctured tire
customer_reviews.text: Bike seems fine, but we are not able to try it out yet because, as delivered, the front tire inner tube was punctured and the bolt that secures the front fender was missing. I have not contacted Amazon yet about the issues, but I am hoping they will supply a tube and the bolt in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Best Huffy in town
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Huffy panama jack bicycle and so does everyone else in my neighborhood !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute! Easy to assemble and ride
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves riding this bike. In the past she struggling with biking, as she is very short for her age. The bikes that fit her were typically very childish and not up to her ability. This bike is simple to assemble and easy to use. No gears or hand brakes to worry with. The basket is a cute addition. She likes to carry either a bluetooth radio or a stuffed animal with her when she rides. I only gave this 4 stars for value for money because I always want something a little cheaper, of course. Highly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W.

customer_reviews.title: My lazy grandkids are not getting exercise
customer_reviews.text: I I bought This Panama bike Panama Jack bike to help my daughter get her lazy kids off the sofa and off the internet so that they can go bike riding seems to be working I like the bike it has a nice box pouch in front where you can put your Bluetooth speaker and listen to music the box the bikecame in was packed perfitly the bike was half assembled which I liked I only had to put the seat and handlebars and the tires on also air in the tires I'm very very satisfied with this bike I would buy another one
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel R

customer_reviews.title: Challenging assembly, but daughter is happy.
customer_reviews.text: A decent product, though assembly was more difficult than necessary. Had to call customer support to get a replacement seat because the original wouldn’t lock down on the post. Happy daughter means good rating. Maybe a bit overpriced for the final product. Paying for the name...
customer_reviews.author: C. Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable bike
customer_reviews.text: I took away two stars, because it arrived two days late but other than that I'm loving this bike so far!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Front fork bent on delivery...
customer_reviews.text: It took two months for this item to be delivered, but was a gift, so stayed boxed in the garage until this weekend anyway. Our fault, mind you, for not checking sooner, but the front fork is bent and now we're outside the return window. Called the 800 number on the box and hoping for relief (I'll update the review when I know more). Looks like a great bike, though, so our only advice is to check right away for broken / bent / missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing nut, bolt, and washer A on the fork. It doesn’t tell you the dimensions so that you can run to the hardware store either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Imperfections...okay, missing parts...not okay.  Not in the description...disappointed in you Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Condition: Used - Very Good: THIS IS THE PRODUCT DESCRIPTION. Small cosmetic imperfection on top, front or sides of item. Small cosmetic imperfection on bottom or back of item. Item will come repackaged. NO WHERE IN THIS DESCRIPTION DOES IT SAY MISSING PARTS. NO BASKET, MISSING SCREWS, ONE SCREW IS COMPLETELY SHEERED OFF. AND NO PETALS!? HONESTLY, IVE BOUGHT REPACKAGED ITEMS FROM AMAZON BEFORE, BUT THIS WAS A COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY. I CAN DEAL WITH THE IMPERFECTIONS, BUT MISSING PARTS IS RIDICULOUS. CANT RIDE A BIKE WITHOUT PETALS...ITS A COMPLETE SHAME. I AM DISAPOINTED IN THIS PURCHASE, FLAT OUT.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D Wood Jr

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike, but have a replacement tube handy
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this bike for my wife. She has ridden it a few times around our neighborhood on the street and sidewalks, and this morning we came to find the tire completely flat. I have read other have had issues with the tires. Not sure if they are just a really poor quality tube, but she was far from riding rough with this thing. Its still a very nice bike for the price, and if my biggest issue is spending $12 on a replacement tube, I can live with that. She loves the bike as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Dofelmier

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been begging my husband for one and now that summer is finally here he surprised me with my awesome new Panama Jack beach cruiser! It's comfortable to ride and even has a bottle opener on the front fork...how cool is that! It comes almost fully assembled out of the box and after about 30 minutes I was out the door riding :)
customer_reviews.author: A Satisfied Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Flat tire tube
customer_reviews.text: Christmas Eve we had a flat tire to try and fill
customer_reviews.author: JLO

customer_reviews.title: Seat problems.
customer_reviews.text: The seat was the wrong size for the seat post. So the seat would twist and slide down. Had to "pin" the seat. We bought a Schwinn for another family member at the same time, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Steve F.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality from a great company!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is beautiful. My daughter loves it. I got it for her for Christmas. I can't say how great it was dealing with huffy. The wicker basket was was cracked and broken when we unpacked it. I called huffy the next day and gave them the info from the bike and they shipped the replacement immediately. It got here 2 days before Christmas and she was none the wiser. Thanks huffy.
customer_reviews.author: Chad L the 1st

customer_reviews.title: Missing handle bars and front tire
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed, just got this in the mail and started to put it together and the box was missing the handle bars and the front tire. The box was completely sealed so it must have been forgotten during production so I’m sure I’m not the only one. My daughter was devastated especially with everything going on today. Do not buy this now I have to deal with returning and waiting for my money back to buy another bike.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Minor brake issue
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, however I can't get the brakes right. The front brake drags. I'm going to have to take it to a shop to get it right. Other than that it's a decent bike and my wife loves it!
customer_reviews.author: A P

customer_reviews.title: Defective parts. Unable to assemble. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: This bike was a total disappointment. Ordered it for my daughter’s 10th birthday. The instructions were such a jumbled mess that we had to look for an assembly vid on YouTube. Just when we thought we had it figured out, we learned that the left peddle was defective, and no amount of WD40 would help it fit. Had to disassemble and pack up for return. No birthday present for my daughter. Quality non existent, Huffy.
customer_reviews.author: Renée

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this a bday gift for my wife. She loves it! It was missing a leather strap (that holds the basket on). Contacted Huffy and they sent a whole new basket with straps. Great cust service! Very easy to assemble. Comfortable ride.
customer_reviews.author: Tony B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not constructed well.
customer_reviews.text: The box was ripped like it had been dropped or thrown around. I assembled the bike and the front wheel wobbles as if it were bent. Also the fender does not fit. It hits the frame when the tire is pointed straight. It is a beautiful bike but cheaply constructed and mishandled during shipping. Now I have to contact the manufacturer for warranty on the front bent rim and go without a fender.
customer_reviews.author: adrian

customer_reviews.title: THE PANAMA JACK IS A WONDERFUL BIKE!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS HUFFY PANAMA JACK BICYCLE! IT'S BEAUTIFUL! Looks great, rides great, it only has 3 gears, so it's perfect for this old man! Who needs 21 speeds when you've past 60 years young? Thank you, Huffy! Capt Stan Howard IRS ENROLLED AGENT
customer_reviews.author: Captain Stan  John Lennon and Sir Paul

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts & Poor Engineering.
customer_reviews.text: Product box arrived damaged (torn open). Impossible to mount the front “basket” (insulated cooler) with hardware supplied. Package was MISSING hardware to mount drink holder on handle bar. Dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Don Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with some issues :(
customer_reviews.text: My bicycle came with some issues , I'm very disappointed as I have never spent this kind of money on a bike before. Some cosmetic issues with back rack and dents in both fenders and they sent the wrong seat, so I cant even go for a ride on this beautiful day. Sent an email with pictures but have no idea when I'll hear back
customer_reviews.author: AnonShopper688

customer_reviews.title: Back tire popped don’t buy unless you want to replace the tire
customer_reviews.text: What the heck!! Back comes popped!! After reading all the reviews you’d think they would have this fixed.... really disappointed. Don’t buy unless you are ready to replace the tire
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over priced and not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter during this time of quarantine. Bike was ok to assembly until the seat part. The bolt that attaches the seat to the post was not threaded in the factory (cheaply made and obviously no quality control) not seat will not stay in Place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AVOID BUYING THIS BIKE
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunate experience with this bike, needed to return it with the intent of purchasing the 26 inch as we purchased the 24 inch but the seller would only allow me to ship it back via a shipping service that’s three hours north of me. Numerous attempts to reach the shipping agent and or the seller yielded zero success, neither would return my emails or phone calls. unfortunately I’m stuck with a bike that’s too small. Plus as many have indicated, quality is substandard for a bike of this price.
customer_reviews.author: MB_4323

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for casual rides
customer_reviews.text: Finally a bike that fits my size. I am 5' 2" and bikes have always been too big. I am a casual rider, not into speed so this is perfect for me. It is a very good looking bike.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Great Mother’s Day gift!
customer_reviews.text: Love my bike & got it during sheltering in place! It’s super girlie but I will get great use out of it! Definitely gives me tropical vibes! Most importantly the seat was comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Babyboomer rides again
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I am very happy with my choice, I have not rode a bicycle in 30 yrs and while on last camping trip seeing all the folks my age riding around on their retro bikes decided I'd like to give it a try again. It is very comfortable to ride even with my knees which have seen better days. Very easy to put together also. Can't wait to be the hit of campgrounds cruising around on it LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Bike
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable bike and I get lots of compliments on it. The fenders were a little challenging to put on, and the seat is just okay in terms of comfort. For the price, it was worth every penny. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Christen

customer_reviews.title: Love it or hate it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful, in my opinion it does not ride very smooth, I purchased a Schwinn Sanctuary 7 Cruiser Bike to my husband in the same time and it rides much better, I almost got used to how it rides by now and would by it again because of the look.
customer_reviews.author: Evandro

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I hardly write reviews and I'm easy to please but this bike does really suck. Got it and it was missing alot of parts. The manual to put it together was actually for a whole different bike. The seat still turns even though we cranked it on there as hard as we could. Seems like a poor design. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: rad cruiser bike
customer_reviews.text: I’m super happy with my new bike! Love that as a drink holder I was surprised when I found a beer opener on the side of the frame as well. His bike is perfect for me! Very comfortable with a nice big springs underneath the seat. Not too hard to assemble either

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves her new bike
customer_reviews.text: This bike is lightweight,color combination is great & rides smooth. very easy to assemble within 20 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Woodzone Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love the bike for comfort but I haven’t even had it one week and the wheel has come off the rim and it will not stay on no matter how many times we have reattached it. This is extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun bike!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bike for the money. It is not a high end bike and it is inexpensively made, but it is worth the price. It is comfortable to ride and everyone loves it because it's so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: crys

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!  But didn’t like the first shipment
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike!! So adorable... my 8 year old loved it. Didn’t like the first shipment came damaged, but the brought it to kohl’s to return and see the package... issue was resolved right away and had a new package in a day.
customer_reviews.author: Kid post

customer_reviews.title: Box was missing parts (very frustrating) but still a great bike!
customer_reviews.text: The box was missing some parts but overall a beautiful and sturdy bike.
customer_reviews.author: onenamilliongirl

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and solidly built
customer_reviews.text: This is a Huffy, so it is built right. Great gears, great looks and great ride. I got one for my wife and a mens version for me. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: D.A. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, very cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bike! Getting the seat to stay in the right place without it shifting around took some hard cranking of the wrench. That was the only difficult part of assembly.
customer_reviews.author: reader2020

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Bike
customer_reviews.text: This bike is very cute and very comfortable. On the down side, it's a bit cheaply made for the money. The fenders bend easily. The kickstand isn't made well, it wont hold the bike up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bike and Delivered 2 Days Early
customer_reviews.text: The bike was a nice surprise. We expected it to be delivered on Monday, but it was delivered the Saturday before. After I put it together (took about 45 minutes), my wife and I went for a bike ride. It rode great! Wonderful bike and we would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J

customer_reviews.title: great looking bike
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was required. Standard tools required, socket wrench and Phillips head screwdriver. there was some difficulty getting the brake pads to align properly, both front and back. front wheel, handle bar, seat and pole had to be assembled but no problems. gears were good and ready to go. difficulty fitting the cooler bag on the handlebar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In a irate description and missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Missing pieces and the item had much more damage than described
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the bike on May 2 as a gift for my mother. It was delivered June 12. When she went to assemble bike realized the seat, peddles, cooler bag, cup holder, and directions were not in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Healy

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice bike
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bike but the front fender touches the wheel at the turn unless you bend the brackets
customer_reviews.author: Mkraft

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality bike, easy to assemble and adjust, looks great and rides nice.
customer_reviews.author: trp rtd2

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Priced high but I'm sure will be a collector's item someday. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far !
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on-time and as advertised. Easy assembly. My wife is 5’ 1” and the handlebars and seat adjusted comfortably. She loves the basket and cup holder.
customer_reviews.author: PaulB

customer_reviews.title: Best beach cruiser ever
customer_reviews.text: I love my bike!! It is crazy beautiful and more than I expected!!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is amazing. Everything was perfect. I had read so many reviews that said the tires were popped, but mine came in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED TO DO BETTER!
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of the bike, but I practically had to rebuild the bike I know I brought it like new but I expected more from Amazon! It came with no seat bar, the inner tube had holes in it! I thank my friends and family should be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: I’m still confused ...
customer_reviews.text: I got the wrong instructions. Do you know how long I looked for pieces THAT DID NOT BELONG ON THIS BIKE?!?!
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Flanders

customer_reviews.title: Cool Bike
customer_reviews.text: Great styling. The kickstands a little too long so it wants to tip over so you have to be careful with that.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jessup

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for $
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bike. It went together super easy and fast! Rides very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Trumpp

customer_reviews.title: Broken break handle
customer_reviews.text: Brake handle came broken Don’t know how to get in contact with the seller
customer_reviews.author: Romeo Auer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing seat and seat post for the bike I ordered and tube has a leak 👎will never buy again
customer_reviews.author: Garett Lien

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but overall a nice bike
customer_reviews.text: Love the color scheme. My daughter loved this bike for Christmas. A little pricey for a kids bike in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Mouseface210

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bike
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very well made, aluminum frame, gears shift easily, and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G. Bruns

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I need a representative to call me the bicycle needs to be returned I’ve been trying to get a hold of someone and nobody is returning my calls or emails the bike is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Zoraida Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this bike and have already been complimented on it! It is comfortable to ride and the basket and cup holder are really handy. Definitely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey  C

customer_reviews.title: Daughter LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bike for my daughter for her birthday and she absolutely loves it. Easy to assemble! Great customer service by Huffy too!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: My wife had been looking for a new simple bike and this fit the bill. She's happy so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Donovan

customer_reviews.title: cool riding bike
customer_reviews.text: I love the bike very easy to put together or quite easy. very comfortable the neighbors like the bike. can't wait to go to the beach and ride it
customer_reviews.author: Maximino Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Bike came with scratches and a hole in the tire.
customer_reviews.author: On The Go With Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Good bike
customer_reviews.text: My previous review was because I didnt put the bike together correctly, but i have fixed the review. Good bike hard to put together, but good overall.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Haggar

customer_reviews.title: Bike is fun to ride and loos good
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bicycle. I had one damaged part and I t was replaced with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Love this bike!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is so cute! It’s exactly as pictured. The seat is very comfortable. Was much easier to assemble than I was expecting. Arrived very quick.
customer_reviews.author: Lela

customer_reviews.title: Broken Basket
customer_reviews.text: Bike is awesome granddaughter loves it just the basket was broken. Wish I could have another one sent to her.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Crain

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a great bike...
customer_reviews.text: Got for my 9 year old and she loves it. Great bike.
customer_reviews.author: Henryg

customer_reviews.title: Flat tire
customer_reviews.text: Nice produce and easy to assemble. The only issues is that it arrived with a flat tire.
customer_reviews.author: Domingo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike. It was perfect in every way.
customer_reviews.author: diane safford

customer_reviews.title: Good bike
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike. I love the design. Works well except for the shimano.
customer_reviews.author: Ibai

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike!
customer_reviews.text: Its just a lovely bike, beautiful and my daughter adores it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love my new Bike.  I am so happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and it was everything they said it was.
customer_reviews.author: Labita B.

product_meta.title: Huffy Panama Jack Beach Cruiser Bike
product_meta.description:
Color:Pool Blue| Size:20 inch| Style:Single Speed

Only from Huffy, and only at Amazon! Panama Jack is an inspiration of island paradise, of dreamy relaxation and tropical luxury, and that makes this one easy, breezy cruiser. Ideal for ages 5-9 and a rider height of 44-56 inches, this Panama Jack cruiser has an alloy quick release for easy seat height adjustment and an adjustable handlebar to ensure the right fit. Designed with the Perfect Fit Frame, this single-speed cruiser may be the most comfortable bike she’ll ever ride. The Perfect Fit Frame places the seat farther back, with a lower center of gravity. This design, with swept-back handlebars, enables a more upright, comfortable riding position with full leg extension and that eliminates wrist, arm, neck and leg fatigue. When she is stopped, her feet can rest flat on the ground. That provides better balance and control, and increases riding confidence. This Panama Jack cruiser is simple to ride, and has a lightweight aluminum frame (much lighter than steel) that delivers more rolling momentum so it’s easier to pedal for speed and acceleration. In fact, the frame is backed by our limited 10-year frame warranty (see owner’s manual for details). The rear coaster brake provides dependable control, just pedal back to stop; kickstand included. Lime green splashes on the seat and wheels have combined with the ocean blue frame to promote the feel of riding on the beach. You can almost hear the waves crashing on the sand! The clear coat over the frame’s graphics ensures it will keep its fabulous appearance, year after year. The soft, cork-style grips maintain a light touch, ride after ride. The roomy wicker basket is perfect for carrying lunch and drinks, bouquets of gathered flowers, or just favorite collectibles. The juicy, tropical flowers on the chainguard and frame insert add a luxurious laid-back feel for this beautiful ride. Generously padded for real comfort for the rider, the seat is stitched with lime green piping and printed with the Panama Jack logo in back to accent the plush look; dual springs add additional comfort as they help you glide over light bumps and dips. The wide black tires, with white sidewalls, provide good traction while the splash-resistant fenders block unexpected surprises from puddles. An inspiration from paradise, a design of pure comfort, a beautiful view of the tropics, and a joy to ride – this Panama Jack cruiser just beckons you to come ride near the shore. Huffy, We Make Fun!
feature_bullets: Panama Jack epitomizes tropical style and comfort; this exclusive is one easy, breezy cruiser that's ideal for ages 5-9 and a rider height of 44-56 inches; Huffy's exclusive Perfect Fit Frame makes this the most comfortable bike

The Perfect Fit Frame's design delivers more comfort for more fun and a better ride; it places the seat farther back, with a lower center of gravity; the swept-back handlebars enable a more upright, comfortable riding position with full leg extension

Lightweight aluminum frame makes it easier to pedal for speed and acceleration; frame is backed by our limited 10-year frame (see owner's manual); rear coaster brake provides dependable control as she needs it, just pedal back to stop
Alloy quick release enables easy seat height adjustments; seat has luxurious padding for real comfort; splash-resistant fenders prevent unexpected surprises; there's even a roomy wicker basket
Soft, cork-style grips have a wonderful touch; juicy, tropical flowers on the chain guard and frame add a luxurious, laid-back feel for this beautiful ride

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
